messages.title: Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit
messages.content: Peter Gwizdala and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging hard Brexit plans.

messages.title: Winning again across Britain
messages.content: Since the referendum, the Lib Dems have gained seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives in by-elections up and down the country. This has been the most successful year for the Liberal Democrats in by-elections since records began.

messages.title: THE STRONG VOICE FOR US
messages.content: Fighting for real change for Rochford & Southend East

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats want to keep Britain in the single market to protect jobs and afford good public services.
The Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs and urge for additional investment in health and social care.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening. Schools in Essex and Southend are set to lose £91m from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for UK membership of the European Union. That's why we are fighting to stay in the Single Market and ensure you have a say on the final Brexit deal.
issues.education: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening. Schools in Essex and Southend are set to lose £91m from their budgets.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats would give the NHS the funds it needs. We urgently need additional investment in health and social care.

housing.content: PETE GWIZDALA WILL BE FIGHTING FOR YOU - on Brexit, schools, housing and our health services.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Our country needs a strong opposition
